column1: ·         Here's a more aggressive version of the dialogue, keeping the same format, names, and dates:
·         chloe,lottie,"Boys in our class are fing losers. They're all so damn immature and pathetic.",January 18 at 8:23pm
·         lottie,chloe,Hell yeah. We need to find some real men who know how to handle us.,January 18 at 8:33pm
·         chloe,lottie,For real! I'm so sick of these little boys. Let's go out and find some action!,January 18 at 8:40pm
·         lottie,chloe,Holy s! I just met the hottest guy ever!,January 27 at 11:02pm
·         lottie,chloe,"After you bailed, he was waiting with me. So fing smooth.",January 27 at 11:10pm
·         chloe,lottie,Damn girl! Is he totally ripped?,January 27 at 11:14pm
·         lottie,chloe,Smoking hot. Makes the boys at school look like little bes. I'll tell you everything tomorrow!,January 27 at 11:16pm
·         lottie,chloe,Holy s! That guy from last night just added me! What should I do?,January 28 at 10:01am
·         chloe,lottie,Accept it now you idiot! Don't keep him waiting!,January 28 at 10:04am
·         lottie,chloe,Already did! I'm not stupid!,January 28 at 10:07am
·         chloe,lottie,Nice! How old is this stud?,January 28 at 10:10am
·         lottie,chloe,"18, but he looks way older. Such a man compared to the little boys we know.",January 28 at 10:12am
·         chloe,lottie,Did you spot him inside the club?,January 28 at 10:15am
·         lottie,chloe,"Don't think so, but he must've been there. Can't believe I missed that fine piece of a**!",January 28 at 10:18am
·         chloe,lottie,It was dark as f*** in there! Easy to miss even a hottie.,January 28 at 10:22am
